fact: In 'Hot Rod', the real stuntman, Spanky Spangler, couldn't jump the pool because it was too dangerous even for him. Irony, thy name is 'Hot Rod'.
reply: When a movie about stunts can't even handle a stunt. Reality check much?
youtube_description: Discover the irony in 'Hot Rod' where even the stuntman said, 'Nope!' #shorts #moviefacts #HotRod #mindblown
